title: Unfairly banned? Ban appeal
body:
UPDATE: The jinx who threatened our entire team, soft int'd and made comments calling us retards and telling us to kill ourselves DIDN'T GET BANNED! Fix your shitty broken report system, you piece of trash company - too focused on killing your game; can't wait till the day your company is filing for bankruptcy and is forced to close off League of Legends. 

Hello there,
so recently I had a ranked match with a jinx adc, who wouldn't stop flaming me and my teammates. At no point in the chat do I feel like anything I said justified a ban - this jinx said some pretty crude things with no intention all game. At one point, with no background comments around it, she told me to "kill myself" too; yet I'm justified a ban? If anyone could clarify this situation, it would be of substantial help.

replies.body:
A lot of this is actually passive-aggressive chat use, which is certainly frowned upon. Saying things like you're "gonna carry [someone's] shitty acc [I assume ass?]", "stfu", "U SPASTIC", "u suck mate" etc is the kind of stuff that will inevitably lead to some form of punishment, particularly when it appears consistently.

I think the real question here is not "is this punishable", but rather "should you have received this particular punishment", and for that we'd need to consider your punishment history. Basically, I'm fairly confident in saying that if your previous punishment wasn't a 25 game chat restriction (in the case of a 14-day ban) or a 14 day ban (in the case of a permanent ban), then you *might* actually have a viable reason to appeal.

With that in mind, you need to go to [Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and submit a ticket (under the category "*I have a question about a suspension or restriction on my account*") and take the issue up with them. Bottom line is that if they say it's not a false positive, the ban sticks.

*preceeds to copy toxic text*

*Realises it’s all toxic*

If you think anything I said elicits toxic behaviour and should be on the receiving end of maximum punishment, you're gonna have a hard time dealing with the real world. My entire team collectively agreed that this jinx adc was definitely trolling and flaming us with quite heavily punishable language. I realise it is my fault that I aggravated the situation by even replying after "I cant be bothered replying" - however everything I said was within limits and should not justify a permanent ban. The chat log distorts my stance, due to it only showcasing my end of the chat, which I think is stupid...

What you don’t realize is no one cares about jinx they care about YOU and only you and YOU were toxic.. this isn’t some back allyway where you can act tough and it’s normal. In the eyes of the league community you were toxic. Saying “you're gonna have a hard time dealing with the real world” is just proving your immaturity towards this situation. A well deserved ban well done riot!

> [{quoted}](name=MysticLlamaZ,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=Ex5vRFga,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2018-06-09T02:25:06.755+0000)
>
> A well deserved ban well done riot!

Ooh, good one buddy! What I meant to say was, good luck dealing with your life when League of Legends dies out in a few years and you're forced out of your basement to get some sunlight. This game is dwindling, and there's nothing you can do to stop that - well done Riot! Will celebrate the day your trash company is buried into obscurity and completely eaten alive by Epic Games, who actually care about their fanbase, and don't force loyal players into left-wing SJW rules and trash updates that bury playstyles within a single patch discrepancy. The only fun in this game was the chat - and obviously people like you exist who just want their "safe space" and can't take objective criticism, because it'll hurt your feelings {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
Would you speak to your grandma like that. You ape
My grandma?? Where did my grandma come from - I'm talking to nerds like you like that you sad nerd
I’m just saying how crude and rude you are towards people. Dw dude life will get better I believe!!
It definitely will now that I'm given an exemption from playing this dying game which I have futilely wasted countless hours on.
Good brah we don’t want your kind here good luck brudda
Sunlight brother, you might need some time outside - get out and lose your virginity tubby, you've been playing since season 3 {{item:3070}}

We're not talking about the toxic Jinx here, or the likelihood of their ban worthiness. But you can rest assured that they are probably banned/punished if they were being jerky like you said.

As far as the chat log goes distorting your (stance?) toxicity levels, then yeah it's pretty clear you typed some unnecessary things and shouldn't be too surprised by a punishment. If you can't take ownership for your own behaviour then maybe the real world isn't for you either.

There are plenty of jerks in the real world too. If you counter said jerks by being a jerk yourself then that doesn't make you a morally superior being, it makes you a - believe it or not - jerk.

Awwwwwwww, aren't you a perfect human - why can't we all be like you

Have you had chat restrictions in the past?

What your teammates say has no relevance to how you are judged for your own chat.

You won't get any sympathy from these guys, they are all riot nut suckers, go the the league reddit to get sympathy. tldr Riot punishes you regardless of context, which is stupidity on Riots side and there is nothing we can do, ultimately if your playing league, your gonna have to talk like your from a make believe world to make sure u don't get banned. You can't callout trash play, you can't taunt, you can't do anything that you could do anywhere else, and whats worse is you can get soft inted and have that player get no punishment but because you called him an ass, you can get punished.

you called her a spastic and shit, you also spammed chat saying have fun getting banned thats toxic.
speaking from experience If you didnt type at all and just reported her nothing would really happen cause riot doesn't ban people giving others a bad experience through soft inting but hey you wouldn't of gotten banned.

Epic Games is going to eat Riot Games alive - and there's nothing you can do to stop that XD
Going to celebrate when League of Legends dies in a few years
